comments.text:
When running the Spidermonkey shell, the method JIT and type inference are not enabled by default.

The defaults should match Firefox, I think that is "-m -n".
comments.author: jens@nockert.se
comments.creator: jens@nockert.se
comments.raw_text:
When running the Spidermonkey shell, the method JIT and type inference are not enabled by default.

The defaults should match Firefox, I think that is "-m -n".
